content: Cryptocurrency AMA SG Budget Babe Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Aug 2018Have I waited too long to get into cryptocurrency? is there still any value in investing in it now?I didn't believe it in the past, and after the recent fall in price, I'm still skeptical, but some of my friends are saying that it is something that will eventually take off.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 14 Aug 2018There's always value to be found. I'm a believer of crytocurrencies and blockchain technology and don't think it is too late at all, in fact prices are so cheap right now vs all the advancements that have happened in the last few months! But beware of shitcoins and crypto scams cos there's a lot. Get educated and research first!! 0 comments1
